attributes.action: ENSURE EACH CITY/TOWN HAS A SPECIAL SCHOOL
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ensure by giving offical policies that there will always be a special school in each town and city in the uk for all children who need such a facility.  Inclusion cannot take the most profound children and for those who cant be included or who find inclusion too difficult there must be the insurance that there will be a specialist setting for these children to attend therefore not being excluded from the education system, but being able to learn in a smaller specialist safe enviroment
